Text.val: 04.02.2013 SH SCR17678 I/O properties: Changed CharSet = UTF-8 back to Ansi
05.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)>

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and (days(':3') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) :4) for fetch only
select cast(sum( days(INVO_DUEDATE) - days(INVO_INVDATE) ) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 for fetch only
select cast( count(*) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 for fetch only
